page.title: 15A SCHOOL DAY IN HECKMONDWIKE
page.content: I get up at seven o'clock in the morning and usually have cereal for my breakfast. I set off for school at twenty past eight. I arrive at the Grammar School at twenty to nine in time for the bell at ten to nine. We have four lessons in the morning and three in the afternoon. Typical lessons are Maths, English and French which we have nearly every day. Other lessons are Geography, Physics, History, Chemistry, Craft and R.E. I take sandwiches for my dinner and eat them in the school hall. I set off for home at half past three and I arrive at ten to four. My homework takes about an hour. I then watch television programmes like 'Dallas', 'Blue Peter' 'Dynasty' and 'Coronation Street'. I go to bed at nine o'clock.
